sentences.en: Amongst other things, this exercise improves passing, communication and positioning.
sentences.cn: 除此之外, 此项训练可以改进传球, 比赛中的沟通能力和位置感.

sentences.en: And also the positioning change of different drugs, classes like ARB, CCB.
sentences.cn: 不同药物, 比如ARB 、 CCB的地位之间有什么变化吗?

sentences.en: Automatic design parameterization, using a unique relative positioning and sizing system.
sentences.cn: 自动参数化设计, 采用了独特的相对定位和上浆系统.

sentences.en: College is sponsoring positioning specialist higher - level vocational and technical education.
sentences.cn: 学院的办学定位是专科层次的高等职业技术教育.

sentences.en: Friends of our final positioning. Alienated even oneself all really want to cry.
sentences.cn: 朋友的朋友我们最后的定位。疏离的连自己都好想流泪。

sentences.en: How are you positioning yourself?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样为自己定位的？

sentences.en: How to add a component into a JComponent with absolute positioning?
sentences.cn: 如何添加一个组件到一个绝对定位的组件？

sentences.en: However it seems clear that the major players are aware of this opportunity and are positioning their services to capture it.
sentences.cn: 然而主要的竞争参与者似乎已经明显地意识到这个机会，正在定位它们的服务来抓住这个机会。

sentences.en: IMPROVED GAMEPLAY : Passing and positioning have all been enhanced.
sentences.cn: 改进的游戏性: 传球和站位都被更新了.

sentences.en: It does not require fiducial markers or special patient positioning.
sentences.cn: 它不需要任何基本标志或患者的特殊姿势.

sentences.en: Logistics competency directly depends on a firm's strategic positioning.
sentences.cn: 物流能力是有一家公司的战略定位直接决定的.

sentences.en: Panasonic is advertising a tiny hand - held Global Positioning System device.
sentences.cn: 松下电器最近在广告促销一款小型的手握 式 全球定于系统设备.

sentences.en: Said algorithmic can expand to use on other objective characteristic point positioning.
sentences.cn: 并且本算法的框架可以扩展运用到其他物体的特征点定位上.

sentences.en: Stepper motor control is simple, accurate positioning and so on.
sentences.cn: 步进电机具有控制简便 、 定位准确等特点.

sentences.en: The accurate positioning of an entity relative to a reference.
sentences.cn: 相对于参考基准把某个实体精确定位.

sentences.en: The positioning bidirectional pitch compensation method is applied in NC system.
sentences.cn: 定点式双向螺距补偿法应用在数控系统中.

sentences.en: Their segregated positioning subtly and silently indicates that caution should be taken in their use.
sentences.cn: 它们相对分离的位置微妙而无声地提示着用户,即使用它们时应该小心.

sentences.en: Three axes with linear scale for closed - loop high accuracy positioning.
sentences.cn: 三轴搭配光学尺做回馈补偿,提高机台精度.

sentences.en: Use of a GPS, Global Positioning Satellite device is recommended.
sentences.cn: 到了该处, 推荐配备使用全球卫星定位工具.

sentences.en: When in cursor-positioning mode, the user can tab to, or position the cursor on, any character in the input field.
sentences.cn: 当您处于游标定位模式时，用户可以切换，或者定位游标到输入区域的任何一个字符之上。

words.tran_cn: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置

phrases.tran_cn: 位控制；定位控制；位置控制

trans.tran_en: the position held by a product brand in the opinion of consumers, in comparison with its competitors' brands

trans.tran_cn: [计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置
